## Description
[![@duncanbeevers](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/7367?u=4ed0a151ef6aecd7ca8f93553c441507b22391fc&v=4&size=48)](https://github.com/duncanbeevers)
[duncanbeevers](https://github.com/duncanbeevers)
opened [on Mar 12, 2019](https://github.com/vadimdemedes/ink/issues/153#issue-419800602)
Issue body actions
Listening to `stdout.on('resize')` is pretty straight-forward, but it looks like the ink renderer is instantiated at a [fixed terminalWidth](https://github.com/vadimdemedes/ink/blob/1aaabc62c819d7f06f1dc12573f008adcd43f92f/src/renderer.js#L25).
Is it feasible to reconfigure the renderer or to create a new renderer in response to terminal size changes?
React with 4ribelo, sindresorhus, maticzav and apeckham
